trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract base class for an extender control.
The ExtenderControl class enables you to programmatically add AJAX functionality to an ASP.NET server control.
The ExtenderControl inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> class and implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl> interface.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> class defines the properties, methods, and events that are shared by all ASP.NET server controls.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl> interface is an abstract class, which you cannot instantiate directly.
Instead, you create a derived type.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ExtenderControl"></xref> class.
When overridden in a derived class, registers the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"></xref> objects for the control.
The server control to which the extender is associated.
An enumeration of <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"></xref> objects.
When overridden in a derived class, registers the script libraries for the control.
An object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface and that contains ECMAScript (JavaScript) files that have been registered as embedded resources.
Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender*> event and registers the extender control with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control.

After the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> event of the base class is raised, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A> method registers the extender control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
Sends server control content to a provided <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object, which writes the content to be rendered in the browser window.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object that receives the server control content.
Registers the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"></xref> objects for the control.
This method is a private member and cannot be inherited.
The server control that the extender is associated with.
An object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface and that contains <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"></xref> objects.
Registers the script libraries for the control.
This method is a private member and cannot be inherited.
An object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface and that contains ECMAScript (JavaScript) files that have been registered as embedded resources.
Gets or sets the ID of the control that the extender is associated with.
The ID of the server control that is being extended.
Overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible*> property to prevent setting this value.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the extender control is rendered on the page; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
